name: Ripples (Dlboard)
description: Dan hasn't even made it through his first day interning at this insurance company, but after what he will soon discover is more than an average earthquake and power outage, he may be the only one who can stop the impending destruction of the world as he knows it. If he's going to live long enough to do so he'll have to answer one question first: how do you survive against a predator that you can't see? Well for starters, avoid the ripples.
